creator: PocketSurvey Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Building surveying templates for surveyors including:

- Photographic Schedule of Condition
- Snagging Survey

Suitable for surveyors, surveying practices, building owners, property managers, etc.

PocketSurvey is making surveyors efficient by helping you "Collect Data NOT Paper!"

Use our Pocket Survey surveying tool to save time and money when undertaking any complex data collection project. It’s much more than a simple market research survey tool – it’s very, very powerful, ideal for industrial-strength surveys such as building surveys, housing surveys and asset management surveys. The perfect app for surveyors and surveying practices.

With Pocket Survey you collect data on smartphones or tablets out in the field and transfer it to your desktop via the Cloud. But you do NOT need an Internet connection to collect data, simply transfer your data when one becomes available. No login or web account required.


* WHY USE POCKETSURVEY?

Thousands of organisations waste time and money by collecting data on paper, waste more time and money by copying the paper notes to a spreadsheet, and then waste even more time and money when producing reports or analyses that take hours! PocketSurvey eliminates all this wasted effort.


* FREE EDITION WITH PROFESSIONAL SAMPLES

This FREE edition lets you trial our professional survey templates, downloadable from our survey store (limited to 3 buildings).

You can also export data to CSV files on your mobile device, without the need for the desktop database & reporting system in the professional edition.

With the Desktop part of the PocketSurvey software, you can produce Reports in Seconds.


* SAMPLE PROFESSIONAL SURVEY TEMPLATES

In this App, you can download most professional trial surveys and try them out on your own mobile tablet or phone.

After trying out the professional surveys you can take out a subscription for the survey you need to use. This will enhance your business and save you time and money.

The free surveys are fully functional but lack the sophistication of the desktop reporting system in our professional surveys.

- Building Condition Surveys
- Snagging Surveys

* RELATED SURVEYING APPS

- PS Mobile App for a Full Range of Survey Templates

- PS Housing App for Social Housing & Quality Survey Templates

- PS Commercial App for Commercial Building Survey Templates

- PS Compliance App for Risk Inspection Templates


* PRO SUBSCRIPTIONS

The Professional edition of PocketSurvey requires a paid subscription.

The Professional edition is needed to run any of our professional survey templates without restrictions and produce report and exports on your desktop PC.

It allows you to gather data from multiple mobile workers using the Cloud Transfer feature, and then use our powerful desktop database & reporting system to review your data & produce Word, PDF and Excel reports with a single click.


* CONTACT US

PocketSurvey is a flexible building surveying software solution which can produce simple to complex industrial-strength surveys and reports in the Commercial, Residential, Social Housing and Residential Sectors.

It is the most powerful app on the market, extremely easy to use, and our support team are on hand should you need any assistance.

For more information please ring us on UK 0161 818 4683 or make an enquiry via our website www.pocketsurvey.com
descriptionShort: Building surveying app including Photographic Schedule of Condition Survey

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
The new version of the PocketSurvey Mobile has many improved features.

- Pick photos from your device gallery
- An easy to navigate menu structure
- Menu filters to help locate options in long menus
- Automatic alert when new Templates or Visit lists are available
- Improved data viewer similar to Data Manager
- Ability to review/confirm data mid-survey
- Streamlined data transfer
- Automatic licence updates
- Gesture recognition for photo zoom
- Spanish and Dutch language support
